With Appsfire you can kill any app thatâs running or even delete it!+AMAZONâS FREE APP OF THE DAYIf you use the Amazon Appstore, we present you with Amazonâs Free App of the Day every day!+ FILTERED SEARCHSearch the Google Play Store for just the type of app youâre looking for. Filter by price to get that app you need for free!-----Follow Appsfire on Google+, Facebook & TwitterGoogle+: https://plus.google.com/103351434327578783579/postsFacebook: http://facebook.com/appsfireTwitter: @appsfireRead our blog: http://appsfire.com/blogAlso on the web: http://appsfire.com------While Appsfire strives to mirror the prices of apps as they are listed in Googleâs Play Store, from time to time there may be brief discrepancies between the listed price of an app in the Play Store and the price displayed in Appsfire. reviews.title: App crashes
reviews.comment: Not working on my nexus 4.(android version 4.3)
reviews.author: Arjun Seshadhry

reviews.title: Not like iPhone version at all
reviews.comment: I use to have iPhone for long time and used appsfire app for long time and I can say it\'s really saves you money and showw you lots of apps which gone free every day, however when I change to android and seen this app in play store I thought it\'s gonna be the same but unfortunately it is the other way around. It does not give you anything which gives in iPhone.  Well,.. hope they improve it in near future so I could change my feedback to positive.
reviews.author: M Parkook

reviews.title: Not that great
reviews.comment: Not feelinh this app. The ios app is a lot better and is updated daily. If this app was managed and had the same design and updates as the ios app this would be a 5 star.
reviews.author: Andrea Arboritanza

reviews.title: No more best deals!
reviews.comment: I used to be able to get into the best deals today category, but now when I open the app, it says loading and then that category disappears!  Would be five stars if I had that category, as that was mostly why I got this app. Please fix!  Ok, so today I went on, and finally best deals today showed up! Thanks!
reviews.author: MIKE Winrow

reviews.title: App pulse?
reviews.comment: Make it like ios Introduce app pulse

reviews.title: Lame android version
reviews.comment: I love this on my ipod but this sucks. Many of the games don\'t even exist, minecraft 2, super mario bros? As if. Very poor app, a shame compared to the one on ios
